Describe the feature and the problem it solves.

## Use Case
What is the user need and workflow?

Outline the desired behavior and any resource/data source additions.

## Alternatives
List any alternative solutions considered.

Relevant NetBox API endpoints or models.

Anything else that would be helpful.
